gCO2 eq, = <ram_default_strip_size> / <ram_density> * <ram_die_impact_gwp> + <ram_base_impact_gwp>=42742.65217, intermediate variable coming from above value, designed to deduce the impact of 'other devices' for personal laptop based on ADEME impact values for a whole laptop

kgSb eq, = <ram_default_strip_size> / <ram_density> * <ram_die_impact_adp> + <ram_base_impact_adp> =2.76E-03,  intermediate variable coming from above value, designed to deduce the impact of 'other devices' for personal laptop based on ADEME impact values for a whole laptop
GB, hypothesis for 'other devices' impacts computation

gCO2 eq ADEME's database for digital footprint (v 2.0) https://base-empreinte.ademe.fr/documentation/base-impact (last access on 19th may 2025) after creating an account on the ADEME website, going to section "4 - AI - Base Impacts®- Documentation" and by clicking on the file "Numérique".

kgSb eq ADEME's database for digital footprint (v 2.0) https://base-empreinte.ademe.fr/documentation/base-impact (last access on 19th may 2025) after creating an account on the ADEME website, going to section "4 - AI - Base Impacts®- Documentation" and by clicking on the file "Numérique".

"gCO2 eq, =<GWP fabrication ordinateur portable ADEME> - (<default_CPU_GWP_impact> + <default_RAM_quantity_per_personal_laptop>/<ram_default_strip_size> * <I_mem_strip GWP>)=1.25E+05, we substract a base CPU and RAM impacts from the value provided by Ademe in the Base Empreinte for a laptop"

"kgSb eq, =<ADPe fabrication ordianteur portable ADEME> - (<default_CPU_ADP_impact> + <default_RAM_quantity_per_personal_laptop>/<ram_default_strip_size>*<I_mem_strip_ADP>)=-1.18E-02, Same as above, but our computation results in a negative value (the value from the Base Empreinte seems a bit low) se we replace it by 0"

"gC02 eq, =<ordinateur fixe professionnel + écran GWP> - (<default_CPU_GWP_impact>> + <RAM ordinateur professionnel par défaut>/<ram_default_strip_size>*<I_mem_strip GWP>)=225682.0271, Same as above but for the desktop computer"
"kgSb eq, = <ordinateur fixe professionnel + écran ADP> - (<default_CPU_ADP_impact> + <RAM ordinateur professionnel par défaut> / <ram_default_strip_size> * <I_mem_strip_ADP>)=1.03E-02"
